objective: Visual proof lineage timeline showing Source → Seal → ETag → ACK chain

stage_visualization.description: Four-stage timeline: Source, Seal, ETag, ACK with circular indicators
stage_visualization.acceptance: All stages render with correct icons and colors

color_coding.acceptance: Stage circles and badges color-coded based on status

metadata_display.description: Each stage shows timestamp and relevant metadata (path, hmac, etag, tower)
metadata_display.acceptance: Metadata cards display key-value pairs for each stage

lineage_integrity.description: Visual HMAC chain representation with connecting line
lineage_integrity.acceptance: Timeline line connects all stages, info box explains HMAC seals

loading_state.description: Loading spinner and graceful fallback to mock data
loading_state.acceptance: Shows loading state, handles API errors gracefully

governance.criterion: Lineage Integrity - Visual HMAC chain validation
